name: 3rd International Conference on Inventive Systems and Control
content: 3rd International Conference on Inventive Systems and Control (ICISC 2019) is being organized on 10-11 January 2019 by JCT College of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore. This conference will provide an outstanding international forum for students, professors and tech enthusiast from all over the world to share ideas and achievements in the theory and practice of all areas of computing, systems and control. Presentations should highlight inventive systems as a concept that combines theoretical research and applications in the field of systems and control.
organizers: JCT College of Engineering and Technology
